basics.name: Žiga Putrle
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
Hi, my name is Žiga Putrle, and I'm a software developer leaving in Ljubljana, Slovenia. For the last couple of years, I have been working at Cosylab developing medical control systems but currently I'm working towards my master's degree in Computer Science and Mathematics at university of Ljubljana.

I'm enthusiastic about a lot of things but mostly my interests revolve around programming, control systems, programming language theory, logic, computability, automata theory, computational geometry, algorithms and math in general.

Please feel free to contact me at contact@zputrle.com. I'm always glad to grab a cup of coffee and exchange ideas.

Have a great day!
